data.message: Why do you go to some places more then once but leave all massive areas that have to travel hours to be able to see it? The only time we have actually managed to go was 2014 at Preston! Since then u haven't been back!! Before that I live in the south west and nothing not even once!

replies.message: Hi Sam, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, we can't visit every single one, each year. We can understand that you might be disappointed and will be sure to share your feedback with our teams
The first and only time I have every saw it was 2014 in Preston and that's only due to us moving up here otherwise we would have never saw it
